mapper.select: SELECT NVL(SUBSTR(MAX(CL_FCODE),3,4),0) FROM CLOUD WHERE CL_CPCODE=#{cpcode} AND CL_PRCODE=#{prcode} AND CL_PSCODE=#{pscode} AND CL_SCCODE = #{sccode}

SELECT CL_FCODE AS FCODE, CL_FNAME AS FNAME, CL_FILEPATH AS FILEPATH, CL_FTITLE AS FTITLE, CL_FDATE AS FDATE, CL_FCODE AS FCODE, CL_USERID AS FWRITER, CL_OPEN AS FOPEN FROM CLOUD WHERE CL_CPCODE = #{cpcode} AND CL_PRCODE = #{prcode} AND CL_PSCODE = #{pscode} AND CL_SCCODE = #{sccode}

SELECT CB.CB_CPCODE AS CPCODE, CB.CB_PRCODE AS PRCODE, CB.CB_PSCODE AS PSCODE, CB.CB_SCCODE AS SCCODE, CB.CB_FCODE AS FCODE, CLOUD.CL_FNAME AS FNAME, CLOUD.CL_FILEPATH AS FILEPATH, CLOUD.CL_FTITLE AS FTITLE, CLOUD.CL_FDATE AS FDATE, CB.CB_USERID AS USERID, CB.CB_FWRITER AS FWRITER FROM CB INNER JOIN CLOUD ON CB.CB_FCODE = CLOUD.CL_FCODE WHERE CB.CB_CPCODE = #{cpcode} AND CB.CB_PRCODE = #{prcode} AND CB.CB_PSCODE = #{pscode} AND CB.CB_SCCODE = #{sccode} AND CB.CB_USERID = #{userid}
